# default

**Type Property**

The default strategy based on the context it is used in.

## Declaration

```swift
static let `default`: Text.AlignmentStrategy
```

## Discussion

The default strategy for [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Text] is [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Text/AlignmentStrategy/layoutBased]. UI components that accept user input, such as [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TextEditor] and [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TextField], default to [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Text/AlignmentStrategy/writingDirectionBased].
